video.title: El señor de los Cielos
video.synopsis: Only Aurelio Casillas can fill Pablo Escobar's shoes and become Mexico's biggest drug trafficker of the '90s.

seasons.title: El Señor de los Cielos: Season 1

episodes.synopsis: Detective Mejía organizes the manhunt for Aurelio as the firefights rage on. Although he's a womanizer, Aurelio shows that he loves his family.
episodes.title: Arranca la balacera

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio is relieved to find out his daughter is fine, although he was injured. Aurelio and Mechacorta manage to escape in one of the trucks.
episodes.title: Aurelio traiciona a Pablo

episodes.synopsis: Marco tells Aurelio he'll pay for all he's done. Guadalupe tells Mónica that Aurelio has been arrested.
episodes.title: Cayó el narco

episodes.synopsis: Some of Aurelio's inmates decide to kill him. Ximena and her children are traveling by car, but someone is plotting to cut their trip short.
episodes.title: ¡Se salvó!

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio receives a call from Ximena, who tells him both she and the kids are OK. Don Cleto tells Alba that Ximena and the kids survived the explosion.
episodes.title: ¡Cásate conmigo!

episodes.synopsis: Ximena and Aurelio's wedding day has arrived. The Norteño realizes that an attack has been planned against Ximena and the Jaibo is being hunted.
episodes.title: La boda del año

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio tells Isidro he knows he was the one who had the bomb planted in the car Ximena and the kids were traveling in.
episodes.title: Murió envenenado

episodes.synopsis: Guadalupe doesn't believe the death of her brother Isidro was caused by a heart attack; she's sure Aurelio has something to do with it.
episodes.title: Soy el rey

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio tells the Corporal he's going with them to Colombia; Guadalupe and Mónica show up as well. Jiménez wants Mejía and his girlfriend watched.
episodes.title: Pacto de narcos

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio is furiuos when Guadalupe refuses to let him help her rescue Mónica. The Corporal tells Aurelio that things are getting out of hand.
episodes.title: Rescate suicida

episodes.synopsis: Jairo's planning to eliminate the Corporal, but Aurelio won't have it. Eugenia tells Linares she's worried about the article he wrote in the paper.
episodes.title: ¡Qué tentación!

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio buys a 727 jet to transport drugs. Aurelio sends the drugs by plane, and he and his men travel on a separate plane just in case.
episodes.title: Estoy embarazada

episodes.synopsis: Chacorta arrives at the recording studio to see how Matilde's coming along with the disco song. The Corporal asks Aurelio who Letrudo is.
episodes.title: ¡La pagarás!

episodes.synopsis: Doris tells Ema they tried to kidnap her, but thank God, she managed to escape. Tijera tells Guadalupe that Aurelio managed to get the drugs.
episodes.title: Los secuestraron

episodes.synopsis: Oscar forces Dobladillo to talk with Canica on the phone. Canica tells him where Commander Macario, the one holding Aurelio, can be found.
episodes.title: ¡Lo liberaron!

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio introduces his new pilot to Mónica, but she doesn't give the new hire a warm welcome. Ximena catches Heriberto smoking marijuana with Matilde.
episodes.title: Celos que matan

episodes.synopsis: The Turk tells Coronel Jiménez that a new shipment is arriving from Colombia and gives him a photo of Pombo, the man they're after.
episodes.title: ¡No te mueras!

episodes.synopsis: Roxana asks Guadalupe to help her out with some money, but he takes advantage of her by force. Coronel Jiménez tells Doris about his promotion.
episodes.title: Aprovéchate de mí

episodes.synopsis: Chacorta tests the waters for selling drugs in new territory. Chacorta talks with Aurelio and tells him the drug shop business is doing very well.
episodes.title: Un cuadro de millones

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio asks Irina to get in touch with the president. She says she can't, but she can contact his cousin. Chacorta's drug store project continues.
episodes.title: Las narcotiendas

episodes.synopsis: Marco tells Jiménez they have to dismantle the Casillas' distribution network in the districts. The Villalobos request an appointment with Aurelio.
episodes.title: La primera sospecha

episodes.synopsis: Mónica is furious when Aurelio doesn't answer his cell phone. Ponte tells Marco Mejía his men are ready to move out.
episodes.title: La foto de Casillas

episodes.synopsis: Jiménez gives the green light to go after Aurelio Casillas, and Marco Mejía starts an operation to dismantle the Casillases' organization.
episodes.title: En los titulares

episodes.synopsis: The Villalobos find out about what's going on with Aurelio Casillas and they decide to take advantage of the situation to cut him out of the business.
episodes.title: Fuera del negocio

episodes.synopsis: Marco Mejía tries to intercept the Casillases' communications. Ramiro tells Aurelio that the journalist working against him is Eugenia, Marco's wife.
episodes.title: Aquí tiene mi renuncia

episodes.synopsis: Matilde sleeps with Heriberto. Chacorta tries to shoot Eugenia. Marco Mejía and Chacorta get in a firefight.
episodes.title: Tentaciones peligrosas

episodes.synopsis: Doña Alba hands over the documents for a new lot for the school so she can get Rutila back and continue with her studies.
episodes.title: Todo por venganza

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio and Mónica reunite. After Benítez's nomination, Doris proposes to Jiménez that they organize a dinner party for top government officials.
episodes.title: Secuestrada

episodes.synopsis: Juan Villalobos tells Ximena they know about Heriberto and Matilde's affair. Sonia overhears Ramiro's conversation with Irina and decides to step in.
episodes.title: Quién es el infiltrado

episodes.synopsis: The Corporal visits Aurelio to tell him someone's trying to cut him out of the business. He asks him to help him rescue Ximena.
episodes.title: Cuídate la espalda

episodes.synopsis: Sonia threatens Ramiro saying she's going to tell everything during the meeting, but Ramiro tells her she'll regret it if she does.
episodes.title: Principales sospechosos

episodes.synopsis: The president asks Marco Mejía to give him a list of the names of all the government officials suspected of being involved in the drug trade.
episodes.title: El expediente

episodes.synopsis: Sonia asks a priest for an appointment with the cardinal to confess something very terrible. Matilde confronts Chacorta for having a baby with Aída.
episodes.title: La amante de tu hijo

episodes.synopsis: The Corporal and Tijeras take over Oscar Cadena's organization and hand him over to the police. Aurelio visits the Villalobos and finds a surprise.
episodes.title: Me las pagarás

episodes.synopsis: Sonia meets with the cardinal to show him the evidence of Ramiro's involvement in drug trafficking. Leonor and Marco Mejía spend the night together.
episodes.title: La libreta

episodes.synopsis: Marco Mejía convinces Jiménez he's not willing to work with Leonor anymore. Leonor gets into the recording studio pretending to be a fan of Alejo.
episodes.title: Choque con criminales

episodes.synopsis: Marco returns to his house to gather his things and tries to talk with Eugenia, but she refuses to listen to him and throws him out.
episodes.title: Fuera del camino

episodes.synopsis: The Turk convinces the Topo Galván to help Aurelio convince the Villalobos. Linares is released from the hospital.
episodes.title: Nexos con el narcotráfico

episodes.synopsis: Matilde tells Alba she'll give her a good sum of money and the kid, since he's Chacorta's son. Aurelio tells Guadalupe to get rid of the cardinal.
episodes.title: Sumando muertes

episodes.synopsis: Alfonso authorizes the publication of Eugenia's article on the cardinal's death with no changes.
episodes.title: Algo está cambiando

episodes.synopsis: Marco Mejía visits Ramiro in his office and asks about Sonia. Ramiro says she's in London with her daughter. Aurelio meets Leonor and flirts with her.
episodes.title: Nuevo romance

episodes.synopsis: Ximena asks Aurelio if he had something to do with the death of the cardinal. Aurelio promises to change.
episodes.title: Déjame escapar

episodes.synopsis: Mónica feels bad about hitting Triste and apologizes, and says Aurelio won't see her stupid face around anymore. Ximena visits Cleto.
episodes.title: No me veas la cara

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio tells the Corporal and Tijeras that he's leaving them the Robles' and the Villalobos' territory. Cleto is worried about the shipment.
episodes.title: Esta vida no es para mí

episodes.synopsis: Leonor drugs Alejandro so he won't make a move on her. Ximena is thinking of leaving Aurelio. Aurelio wakes up to an empty bed.
episodes.title: Confesión de amor

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio asks his men to put everything on hold and start looking for Ximena. The Topo Galván proposes a partnership with Oscar Cadena.
episodes.title: En busca de Ximena

episodes.synopsis: Benítez thanks General Jiménez for not arresting Don Cleto, and he says the drug cartels were hit hard.
episodes.title: El regreso

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio hits Ximena and tells her she's not allowed to leave the house without his permission. Leonor is very worried that Aurelio found her gun.
episodes.title: Golpe al alma

episodes.synopsis: Cabo is depressed after what happened with Mónica. Víctor takes Matilde by force. El Pollo tells El Topo Galván Don Cleto had a heart attack.
episodes.title: Tiempos de infarto

episodes.synopsis: Ponte and Orejas find out Letrudo is General Jiménez himself. Leonor tells Marco Mejía that General Jiménez was at the Casillas ranch.
episodes.title: Provocadora

episodes.synopsis: The Turk tells Aurelio he has the hospital blueprints, but it doesn't look like they'll be able to free Don Cleto without losing some men.
episodes.title: Contrarreloj

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio confronts Don Cleto for betraying him by trying to team up with the Topo Galván. Don Cleto denies it. Doris tells Jiménez to get rid of Marco.
episodes.title: La traición

episodes.synopsis: Marco Mejía shows the lawyer Benítez the recording of General Jiménez doing business with Aurelio Casillas.
episodes.title: Encrucijada

episodes.synopsis: Marco Mejía tells Eugenia and Alfonso he's confirmed that Jiménez Arroyo is the traffickers' government contact. Leonor visits Ponte at the clinic.
episodes.title: Los dueños del mundo

episodes.synopsis: The Topo Galván tells the Pollo that he's going to ally with Mónica, because he's going to need her Colombian contacts. The Turk and Randy talk.
episodes.title: Tras los pasos de Casillas

episodes.synopsis: General Jiménez tells Marco he's willing to talk but only with the judge assigned to him, on the condition that Doris is granted immunity.
episodes.title: La boca bien cerrada

episodes.synopsis: Alba warns Heriberto not to follow in Aurelio's footsteps, because it's going to end badly. Aurelio has a confession he's forced to make to Mónica.
episodes.title: Muerta de los celos

episodes.synopsis: Eugenia asks Vanesa about Alejandro Negreteñ she tells her she was with him at the Casillas ranch during a curfew.
episodes.title: La amenaza

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio kidnaps eugenia and takes her to a bodega. Heriberto is very upset about the article that came out in the paper on Alejandro's disappearance.
episodes.title: No diga nada

episodes.synopsis: Alfonso goes looking for Eugenia, and can't believe what he finds. The Turk tells Ximena Heriberto had nothing to do with Alejandro's disappearance.
episodes.title: Prisionera en mi casa

episodes.synopsis: Chacorta warns the Turk to be careful around Aurelio, because he's a cold-blooded killer who is capable of anything.
episodes.title: La culpa es de ella

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio escapes from the security building. Ochoa finds a bodega filled with cocaine. Ponte finds a computer. Leonor finds a room full of documents.
episodes.title: La fuga

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio arrives at the hotel where Mónica is staying. Turco asks Chacorta to get rid of Miss Sinaloa's body, because Marco Mejía is on his way.
episodes.title: Camino a la verdad

episodes.synopsis: Marco Mejía hands over the results of Cleto Letrán's autopsy to Ximena and says he's convinced Aurelio Casillas was the murderer.
episodes.title: El nombre del padre

episodes.synopsis: Ximena shows up in the Turk's room and tells him she wants to be with him. Parra tries to kill Leonor.
episodes.title: Finalmente juntos

episodes.synopsis: The Corporal kills Tijeras's cousin J.J. in front of Aurelio Casillas. Leonor tells Ponte they should investigate El Turco, Aurelio's right-hand man.
episodes.title: Secuestrados

episodes.synopsis: Matilde and Heriberto are kidnapped. Aurelio finds out the Corporal wanted to get rid of him, so he invites him to San Luis Potosí to kill Colmenares.
episodes.title: Complot

episodes.synopsis: The Turk shows up just in time to save the Corporal. He gives Aurelio Tijeras's DNA results and tells him the Corporal is loyal to him.
episodes.title: Los platos rotos

episodes.synopsis: Marco Mejía asks Benítez not to tell the president about his suspicions that someone in the government is involved in the Colmenares assassination.
episodes.title: Sin mí te mueres

episodes.synopsis: Chacorta takes Matilde to the hospital. Heriberto is upset. President Benítez tells Marco Mejía he has his back and he won't negotiate with criminals.
episodes.title: Furioso y en la mira

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio invites Ximena over for dinner. The Corporal and his men arrive at the restaurant where Aurelio is eating and a firefight breaks out.
episodes.title: Dura balacera

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio tries to take Ximena out of the country by force, but she manages to disarm one of Aurelio's men, leading to a standoff.
episodes.title: Volver a empezar

episodes.synopsis: The Corporal tells Irina he's looking for Aurelio Casillas. Aurelio returns to Mexico. He tells Irina he's thinking of getting back in the business.
episodes.title: Una nueva cara

episodes.synopsis: Rutila is forced to lie to Ximena for fear of the Turk, and says she misses her father. Aurelio checks into the hospital for plastic surgery.
episodes.title: Vivo o muerto

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio fakes his own death, the Corporal is arrested, Scissors abducts Doña Alba, and Chacorta and his men attack Marco Mejía.
episodes.title: Sorpresa y venganza

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio tries to discover where the Turk hid the stolen money, and Leonor and Ponte barely escape a bombing at the hospital.
episodes.title: Rescate y emboscada

episodes.synopsis: After a shootout, Aurelio and his men rescue Alba from the warehouse. Meanwhile, Chema delves into the truth behind Aurelio's death.
episodes.title: Escape

episodes.synopsis: Leonor leads the police to the Turk's house, but he's long gone. Meanwhile, Mónica kills the Cook and Pinto, and Chema tracks down Aurelio's doctors.
episodes.title: Nuevos horizontes

episodes.synopsis: Mónica returns home to shocking news, Aurelio scours Los Angeles for the Turk and his family, and Chacorta takes three hostages.
episodes.title: Trampa

episodes.synopsis: Ximena confesses that she doesn't love the Turk. After killing Ronnie, Aurelio finds Ximena, who tells him that she will never return to him.
episodes.title: Reencuentro

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio and Ximena reunite with their children, Doña Alba tries to b absolution, and the Turk uses Irina to try to negotiate with Aurelio.
episodes.title: Detención

episodes.synopsis: Matilde wants to team up with Chema behind Chacorta's back, Leo is attacked, and Lay and Aurelio spend a passionate and revealing night together.
episodes.title: Propuestas

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio threatens Mónica, who gets the upper hand in a showdown. Later, Leonor's men exchange gunfire with Chacorta and Heriberto.
episodes.title: Perdóname mi amor

episodes.synopsis: Aurelia pledges his life to Mónica, and Ximena reconnects with her son Heriberto, who wants her help getting out of the drug business.
episodes.title: Estrategia

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio tracks down and tortures the Turk, but gets no answers. Meanwhile, Miravelle vows to help Leonor get out of jail.
episodes.title: Escondite

episodes.synopsis: Mónica suggests that Aurelio deal his own merchandise and part ways with the Colombians. Alba steps in when the idea divides Aurelio and Chacorta.
episodes.title: Entrega especial

episodes.synopsis: Two attacks are planned at the summit between the Mexican president and the U.S. drug czar, and Leonor is accused of injuring a fellow inmate.
episodes.title: Bombas

episodes.synopsis: The Corporal seeks Mónica Robles's help in traveling to Colombia, and Aurelio is enraged to learn that Chema is buying all the Colombian merchandise.
episodes.title: Celos

episodes.synopsis: Heriberto asks Ignacio for help fleeing the country, Mónica shoots Irina, and Chema wants Aurelio's DNA to compare against the body.
episodes.title: Muerte inocente

episodes.synopsis: Elsa chooses a run for office over the offer of a presidential cabinet position, Chema locks Matilde in the house, and Aurelio rouses Lay's suspicions.
episodes.title: Confesiones

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio tries to get Heriberto to stay. Meanwhile, Pedro asks for Max's support and Elsa seeks Chema's help as they campaign for governor of Jalisco.
episodes.title: La condena

episodes.synopsis: Chema asks Matilde to take him on as a partner in her new business, and Aurelio, who's been kicked out of the house, looks for Heriberto.
episodes.title: Rehén

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio cuts off shipments to Chacorta, Matilde blackmails Jacobo, and Elsa is angered by her slip in the polls.
episodes.title: Amenaza

episodes.synopsis: Santiago offers to hire Heriberto, Mónica tells Aurelio that she wants a child with him, and Leonor and a fellow inmate plan an escape from prison.
episodes.title: Libertad

episodes.synopsis: General Montoya discovers Francisco's true identity, Juan Andrés is assaulted during dinner, and Tatiana catches Gildardo as he spies for Tostado.
episodes.title: Al descubierto

episodes.synopsis: Chema tracks the identity of the Mexican who's muscling in on his business, and Leonor seeks Col. Ramos's help in freeing Ponte from jail.
episodes.title: Determinación

episodes.synopsis: Ignacio offers to marry Leonor so she's not deported. Meanwhile, Aurelio threatens Gildardo with dismemberment if he doesn't tell the truth.
episodes.title: Decisiones

episodes.synopsis: Chacorta offers Pepe Johnson a business proposal, Mónica tells Aurelio that she's pregnant, and Aurelio wants to build a lab in Venezuelan territory.
episodes.title: El fruto del amor

episodes.synopsis: Chema seeks Elsa's help in getting Scissors out of jail, and Heriberto makes a life-changing decision to leave the business.
episodes.title: Heriberto

episodes.synopsis: Santiago steps in between Ernesto and Ximena, Lay confesses her enduring love for Aurelio, and Leonor agrees to marry Ignacio to avoid deportation.
episodes.title: El amor de Lai

episodes.synopsis: Mónica is ready to kill Lay, who reveals that Scissors orchestrated the attack. Meanwhile, Ximena protects Heriberto when Chacorta comes to the house.
episodes.title: Unión

episodes.synopsis: After warning Ximena that the shelter project is getting unwanted attention, Santiago proposes to her. Aurelia, Mónica and Lay arrive in Mexico.
episodes.title: Traición

episodes.synopsis: Heriberto chooses to stay, Leonor asks Victoria to help him find Ximena, and Chema orders Matilde to dig up information on Chacorta.
episodes.title: Malos entendidos

episodes.synopsis: Alba confronts Matilde about her alcoholism, Mónica reveals her pregnancy to Chema so he'll stop beating her, and Aurelio travels to Guatemala.
episodes.title: Nuevas oportunidades

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio and Chacorta plot to rescue Mónica and eliminate Chema, Leonor starts following Ximena, and Aurelio reports Chema to Interpol.
episodes.title: Denuncia

episodes.synopsis: After a shootout with Interpol agents, Chema is busted by the DEA. Meanwhile, Santiago suggests that Heriberto turn himself in to protect Ximena.
episodes.title: Intento de soborno

episodes.synopsis: Lay seeks Iñaqui's partnership in a trafficking operation, Leonor demands that Ximena turn over Aurelio, and Pepe threatens Irma.
episodes.title: La vieja casa

episodes.synopsis: Chema tells Andrews to watch Elsa, Leonor and Gómez follow Ximena, and Heriberto tells Aurelio that he wants to settle down and stop hiding.
episodes.title: Miedo

episodes.synopsis: After Heriberto tells Aurelio  he wants to live a quiet life, they get into a gunfight with Leonor at the Casillas Ranch. Elsa visits Chema in jail.
episodes.title: Huida

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio finally sees Heriberto off to Spain. Meanwhile, Tostado shoots Victor in the legs, causing a ripple effect on both sides of the war.
episodes.title: Impedimento

episodes.synopsis: Victor blames Chacorta when she visits the hospital, Leonor learns that Cecilia only has a few days to live, and Mónica loses her baby.
episodes.title: Perdida

episodes.synopsis: Ximena and Santiago prevent Ramos from interrogating Victor; Aurelio suggests to Chacorta that they set up business in Spain to keep an eye on Chema.
episodes.title: Venganza

episodes.synopsis: Rutila gives Ernesto money to buy a house, Irma tells Chacorta that Pepe's blackmailing her, and Father Lázaro finds drugs on Ernesto.
episodes.title: Secuestro

episodes.synopsis: Chacorta hires Ernesto, Aurelio tangles with Pantaleón and Tostado, and Ignacio pleads with Leonor to flee the country.
episodes.title: Emboscada

episodes.synopsis: Elsa is forced to make allowances in order to help Chema escape from prison, and Lilo goes undercover as a reporter and visits Danilo's ranch.
episodes.title: Secreto

episodes.synopsis: Victor warns Rutila about spending time with Ernesto, Lilo quizzes Danilo about his personal life, and Navárez and Leonor visit Chema in jail.
episodes.title: Reclamo

episodes.synopsis: Matilde lashes out against some hecklers, Leonor searches Matilde's business then has her arrested, and Chema asks Whiskers to kill Navárez.
episodes.title: Danilo Ferro

episodes.synopsis: Under orders from Chema, El Bigotes kills Navares but is wounded in the attempt. Later, Ignacio asks Elsa at a press conference if she was involved.
episodes.title: Asesino

episodes.synopsis: A dying Navárez tells Victoria to flee the country. Ramos is wounded when Bull's men kill Whiskers, who's about to spill his secrets to Leonor.
episodes.title: La Gober

episodes.synopsis: Elsa agrees to marry Max just to advance her political career. Meanwhile, Matilde confesses everything about Aurelio and the family to Father Lázaro.
episodes.title: Confesión

episodes.synopsis: Mónica sets up a false company as a front for Victoria's campaign, and Aurelio makes the first donation in Danilo's name for 5 million pesos.
episodes.title: Seducción

episodes.synopsis: Bull and Scissors pose as meat delivery men to break Chema out of jail, and Ernesto grills Matilde about her conversation with Father Lázaro.
episodes.title: Fuga

episodes.synopsis: Irma delivers the first cut of the film, Chema orchestrates a jailbreak and Chacorta sends Manotas to question Father Lazaro.
episodes.title: Susto

episodes.synopsis: Manotas moves against Father Lázaro, infuriating Aurelio. After Aurelio convinces Victoria of his honesty, she invites him to her campaign office.
episodes.title: Ave María Purísima

episodes.synopsis: Iñaqui insists that Lay take over before Matilde's anger gets out of control. Meanwhile, Leonor doesn't believe Father Lázaro killed himself.
episodes.title: Tortura

episodes.synopsis: Mónica learns that she's pregnant, Aurelio seduces Victoria, and Chema asks Matilde to help him get answers about Oscar Cadena's death.
episodes.title: Atracción

episodes.synopsis: Mónica catches Aurelio in bed with Victoria when she shows up unannounced to tell him she's pregnant; Chacorta thinks Ernesto ratted him out.
episodes.title: Mónica

episodes.synopsis: Max doesn't agree with Elsa's plans to close Villa Catalina to boost her image, and Ximena and Santiago try to persuade Rutila to study abroad.
episodes.title: Encuestas

episodes.synopsis: Victor overhears Manotas plotting to kill Ernesto, Max accelerates Ximena's trial to help Elsa's campaign, and Iñaqui starts working with Aurelio.
episodes.title: Pacto

episodes.synopsis: Rutila seeks Aurelio's protection for Ernesto, leading to a confrontation between the two men. Matilde and Bull's plan to abduct Carlitos hits a snag.
episodes.title: Victima

episodes.synopsis: Mónica tries to find out Victoria's feelings for Aurelio, and Leonor uncovers Max's trial strategy as Ximena is found guilty.
episodes.title: Condena

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio learns where Chema's men are hiding out, Heriberto dodges Leonor at the hospital while visiting Alba, and Chema prepares for war.
episodes.title: Traicionado

episodes.synopsis: Matilde makes the mistake of trying to reconcile with Chacorta. Later, Aurelio and Chacorta begin plotting to murder Chema.
episodes.title: Matilde

episodes.synopsis: A fellow inmate attacks Ximena, Aurelio agrees to meet with Santiago, and Ernesto accidentally admits to killing Matilde.
episodes.title: Enfrentamiento

episodes.synopsis: Leonor and Ramos are forced to let Heriberto and Manotas go after a standoff at the hospital. Meanwhile, Ernesto kills Chente to retain Chema's trust.
episodes.title: Rodeados

episodes.synopsis: Lay tells Chema that Matilde is dead, Elsa rejects a visit from Max, and Ignacio poses as a doctor to gather intelligence on Heriberto.
episodes.title: Eliminado

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of Heriberto's death, Aurelio launches a war, Lay confronts Chema, and Chacorta tries to find a way to break the news to Alba.
episodes.title: Guerra

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio sends Chacorta to exact revenge against Leonor and Ignacio for Heriberto's death. At Heriberto's funeral, Ximena demands answers from Aurelio.
episodes.title: Ataque

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio wants Ximena to help him avenge Heriberto's murder. Later, Chacorta and Aurelio seek the truth behind Manotas's death.
episodes.title: Manotas

episodes.synopsis: Ana Sofía feeds Ignacio info on a new drug trafficker, Aurelio prevents an escape attempt by Danilo, and Chema poisons Elsa's dinner.
episodes.title: Informante

episodes.synopsis: Ernesto admits to Victor that he sent Isabel away, then takes the opportunity to flee Ciudad Juárez with Ximena.
episodes.title: Búsqueda

episodes.synopsis: Chacorta admits to Irma that he killed Matilde. Meanwhile, Rutila meets Ernesto's new boss, who turns out to be Chema.
episodes.title: Patrón

episodes.synopsis: Chema sends Ernesto to kill Lucila after she tells Ignacio and Victoria that he abducted Elsa. Meanwhile, Aurelio decides to eliminate Ximena.
episodes.title: Rutila

episodes.synopsis: Victoria investigates Elsa's disappearance, one of Ernesto's thugs betrays him, and Aurelio tries to see if Chema is holding Rutila.
episodes.title: Desaparición

episodes.synopsis: Victoria blames General Garnica for Lucila's murder, and Lay confirms to Victor that Chema has taken Rutila hostage.
episodes.title: Manipulación

episodes.synopsis: Fearing for Victoria, Aurelio tells her to transfer Ernesto. Meanwhile, Alba tells Ximena to leave with Luzma and Santagio.
episodes.title: Inseguridad

episodes.synopsis: Alba recommends that Victor leave the country. Danilo takes Mónica hostage, and she reveals that she's pregnant before getting the upper hand.
episodes.title: Protección

episodes.synopsis: When Aurelio threatens Chema over Rutila, the two meet to negotiate a deal. Meanwhile, Andrews obtains blackmail material against Gen. Garnica.
episodes.title: Apoyo

episodes.synopsis: Chema orders Rutila to go to Guadalajara, Leonor discovers Ignacio's stockpile of weapons, and Chacorta's thugs go after Monica.
episodes.title: El Escuadrón de la Muerte

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio negotiates with Chema for Rutila's freedom. Meanwhile, Helga starts a blackmail scheme against General Garnica.
episodes.title: Negociación

episodes.synopsis: Eleanor tells Victoria that Ignacio works for the death squad, and Helga reveals that she has a recording of the general's confession.
episodes.title: Entrega

episodes.synopsis: Helga gives Victoria and Leonor the general's incriminating recording, and Iñaqui finds the general and attacks him before Helga and Lay can stop him.
episodes.title: General Garnica

episodes.synopsis: Lay tells Aurelio that Iñaqui will have to leave the country after his assault on General Garnica. Meanwhile, Chema orders Lay's assassination.
episodes.title: Sicarios

episodes.synopsis: Ximena tells Aurelio that she knows he killed Santiago, and he begs her not to tell his daughters. But Ximena's admission makes her a target.
episodes.title: Ximena

episodes.synopsis: Mónica and Aurelio's tumultuous relationship takes its toll on both of them, much to Mónica's dismay.
episodes.title: Despedida

episodes.synopsis: Victoria "La Gober" is shocked when she learns that Aurelio has deceived her by making her think that he was someone else.
episodes.title: Engaño

episodes.synopsis: Aurelio enlists Chacorta to take down El Chema after learning that his arch-enemy has slept with Rutila, Aurelio's daughter.
episodes.title: Chema Venegas

episodes.synopsis: Passions run high as La Gober tries to entrap Aurelio, who then has a high-voltage confrontation with Ballesteros that may land him behind bars.
episodes.title: Leonor Ballesteros
